titleStmt.title: William B. Allen et al. to Thomas E. Bramlette
CWG11955

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.collection: 37th - 76th Regiments Enrolled Militia Primary Source Documents (1861-1866)
msIdentifier.idno: Box 80, Folder 863 GREEN COUNTY Reccomendations for Nominations 46th Rgt. Ky. Militia

body.p: To His Excellency Thos E Bramlet Govenor of Ky the undersign would Respectfully recommend George.J. Ralston Esqr as a suitable individual for the office Colonel of Green County under the late proclamation of the Govenor

Wm B Allen
J A Fuggett Lieut & Pro Marshal
Munfordville Ky
Tom Crutchen
Dep pro Marshal
3 Dist Ky
J C Rush
Capt J D Gore
Wm A Sneytt
J B. Brownlee
Address Munfordville as the Mail is uncertain at Greensburg

G. J. R
Green Co Oct 12/63
Recm"d For comdg officer of this county
Geo J Ralston Col
citizens
issue
D W L
Recd I. G. O. Oct 16. 1863
